opportunity.head: Where Learning Meets Opportunity
opportunity.title: Discover Top Companies That Value Your Skills
opportunity.paragraph: See how your learning journey connects to real companies hiring in every tech track while you explore the technologies they use and the projects built with them as you discover their office locations across Egypt and find where your new skills can take you next.

Tracks.head: Your Tech Journey Starts Here
Tracks.title: Explore Your Personalized Tech Career Roadmaps
Tracks.paragraph: Find the perfect learning path for your tech career where each roadmap shows you the key skills to master and the latest technologies used in every track while guiding you through engaging intro videos and real projects so you can confidently prepare for the most common interview questions all in one place.

Reviews.head: What Our Learners Say
Reviews.title: Hear from People Who Grew with TechTrack
Reviews.paragraph: Real experiences from learners who explored tech tracks and built careers in Egypt’s tech scene.

footer.description: Empowering learners in Egypt to explore every tech field through clear roadmaps, essential technologies, and company insights.

HeroSection.head: Start Your Tech Career
HeroSection.title: Discover Your Ultimate Path in Egypt’s Tech World
HeroSection.paragraph: Step into Egypt’s tech world with comprehensive Roadmaps, top companies, standout projects, watch intro videos to understand each field and learn from renowned developers and Master your career path with step by step.
